name: color pop (itch) (unushous)
description:
color pop is a mix of many games ideas, the main idea got from one of brackeys tutorais, i tried to add the color switch principe which based on colors switching, the game code made by me and the design made in colaboration with amine (flash studio)

-how to play: 

-try to click on the screen to launch an arrow toward the circles, the arrow and circle must have the same color to pop it

-in next levels you have to try to avoid the obstacles 

-you can use the help of three weapons, you can slow down time, destroy a random cirlce, or switch the arrow color

good lock =)
